description: This file defines a minimal Qt6 application with a custom WelcomeWidget class that displays two styled labels within a vertical layout. It also contains the main function that initializes the QApplication, creates an instance of the WelcomeWidget, and starts the event loop.

classes.name: WelcomeWidget
classes.description: A QWidget subclass that displays a welcome message with styled labels.

methods.name: WelcomeWidget::WelcomeWidget
methods.description: Constructor that sets up the UI layout, labels, and window properties.

methods.name: int main(int argc,char * argv[])
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes QApplication, shows the WelcomeWidget, and runs the event loop.
